example.name: ornament-turn2
example.description: Demonstration of how to encode inter-note turn with a chromatic alteration of the lower and upper diatonic neighboring tones. Beethoven piano sonata no. 2 in A major, op. 2, no. 2, mvmt. 1: Allegro vivace.

file.name: turn2.ai
file.description: Adobe Illustrator CS3 file containing example. Equivalent to PDF file.

file.name: turn2.mus
file.description: SCORE file used to create example

file.name: description.txt
file.description: this file in plain text format
